long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
☛ Mic Note is an audio recorder + notepad, 2 in 1 tool.
☛ If you are looking for a voice recorder and still want to take notes in the same time, you are right here.
☛ Perfect for Lectures, Meetings, Conferences, Interviews, Brainstormings, Memos, Quick Notes, To-Do Lists, Plannings and more.
☛ Awesome for Work, School and Daily Life.

⦿HIGHLIGHT FEATURES⦿
✔ Auto save timestamps while you are typing for fast playback at specified position.
✔ Edit recording: deletion, trimming, extracting, inserting, etc.
✔ Sync notes with Google Drive or Dropbox between devices.
✔ Auto-export notes/MP3s to clouds.

==Voice Recorder==
✔ Long-term recording up to hours.
✔ Ability to record voice with high quality, MP3(15M/Hour).
✔ Continue last recording: re-record after pause/stop.
✔ Recording will not stop when Chromebook/Laptop screen is black.
✔ Gain controls.
✔ Edit recording: deletion, trimming, extracting, inserting, etc.
✔ Importing mp3, wav, m4a, ogg.

==Notepad==
✔ Insert click-to-play timestamps between words.
✔ Rich editor: bold, italic, text colour, bullet, numbering, highlighting.
✔ Organization: folder, searching, sorting.
✔ Insert PDF/PPT, images.

==Data Share & Syncing==
✔ Support Google Drive and Dropbox.
✔ Share notes in micnote, MP3, PDF, HTML formats.
✔ Sync notes between devices.
✔ Audio email.

==Others==
✔ Offline: can be used without network connection.(excepts first time launch).
✔ Platforms: Windows, Mac, Android

Free account limitations:
Maximum 10 minutes recording time each note and cannot editing recordings etc.
